steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We study your needs and offer the best solutions.

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: We develop the project structure and design prototype.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: We create your website using modern technologies.

steps.title: Testing & Launch
steps.description: We test the site and launch it on the internet.

items.question: How long does website development take?
items.answer: The time depends on the chosen plan and project scope. On average, a project is completed in 5-30 days.

items.question: What does the website cost depend on?
items.answer: The cost depends on the chosen plan, number of pages, and amount of information.

items.question: Do I need to buy domain and hosting myself?
items.answer: No, 1 year domain and 1 month hosting are provided by us.

items.question: How does the process work after ordering?
items.answer: First, we develop the project structure and agree with you, then the work begins.

items.question: Will there be technical support after launch?
items.answer: Yes. After launch, we provide free technical support for 1 to 3 months.
